summary: Add unique non-essential 2 handed combat style female barbarian follower to the game that level up with player from level 15 [HDT required].
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][color=#d9ead3][size=3][color=#00ffff][size=4][b]Guila Mature Follower HDT[/b][/size][/color][color=#00ffff] [b][color=#ff0000]18+[/color][/b]

Add unique non-essential 2 handed combat style female barbarian follower
to the game that level up with player from level 15 [HDT required].

Name : Guila

Class : 2h Warrior

weapon : Guila Axe

Body : -CBBE-

Armor : Not Support Armor

Extra : Carry Weight & Small Shout

[b]Location :
[/b]
[Whiterun Dragonsreach]

[b]Required :[/b]

Skyrim.esm
Update.esm (latest 1.9)
Dawnguard DLC
Dragonborn DLC[/color]
